prompt.0: Please translate the following scientific text from German to English. Do not ask any questions or give any reasons, just provide the translation. Keep the original tone of the text. Examples: German = "Klimawandel" -> English = "climate change", German = "Bericht" -> English = "report", German = "Hitzewellen" -> English = "heat waves", German = "Wahrscheinlichkeit" -> English = "likelihood", German = "beispiellos" -> English = "unprecedented". Here is the text: "Dass der Klimawandel die Hitzewellen in Südasien verstärkt, steht außer Frage. Immer neue Attributionsstudien, die Zusammenhänge zwischen Wetterphänomenen und dem Klimawandel untersuchen, belegen das. So ergab ein Bericht von World Weather Attribution, dass die Wahrscheinlichkeit für Hitzewellen seit dem 19. Jahrhundert 30-fach erhöht ist. Und eine vom britischen Met Office durchgeführte Attributionsstudie zeigt auf, dass die Gefahr beispielloser Hitzewellen in Indien und Pakistan durch den Klimawandel um das Hundertfache gestiegen ist."

hypothesis.0: "There is no question that climate change is strengthening heat waves in South Asia. Ever-new attribution studies, which examine the relationship between weather phenomena and climate change, provide evidence of this. So a report by World Weather Attribution found that the likelihood of heat waves has increased 30-fold since the 19th century. And an attribution study conducted by the British Met Office shows that the risk of unprecedented heat waves in India and Pakistan has increased by a hundredfold due to climate change."

reference_text.0: There is no question that climate change is intensifying heatwaves in South Asia. Continuous attribution studies that examine the connections between weather phenomena and climate change confirm this. For example, a report by World Weather Attribution found that the likelihood of heatwaves has increased 30-fold since the 19th century. Additionally, an attribution study conducted by the UK's Met Office reveals that the risk of unprecedented heatwaves in India and Pakistan has increased 100-fold due to climate change.
